name: Foxy Frog
description:
A 2 player local co-op platformer where only one player can move at a time. Players will have to swap control of their characters to succeed. Both players must reach the purple gem to complete each level. Watch out for frogs - they will come for you if you're still.

Controls:

Player 1 moves with 'a' and 'd', jumps with 'w' and swaps control with 's'.

Player 2 moves with 'left' and 'right', jumps with 'up' and swaps control with 'down'.

Made by Osian Hooson and Jamie Coe for GMTK Game Jam 2019. Art assets by ANSIMUZ. https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/sunny-land-103349
